name: Bondi to Bronte
description: Iconic cliff walk with ocean pools and sculptures in season.
transport: Bus to Bondi Beach; return from Bronte.
long: Mostly paved path with railings. Cafés at both ends, several lookouts, and beach access.

name: Coogee to Maroubra
description: Coastal headlands, rock platforms, and quieter beaches.
transport: Buses serve both Coogee and Maroubra.
long: Undulating sections with stairs. Great sunrise views; bring water.

name: Hermitage Foreshore Track
description: Harbour-side path with city skyline views.
long: Shady sections and small beaches; family friendly.

name: Manly to Shelly Beach
description: Short promenade to a protected snorkelling beach.
long: Accessible path; cafés and amenities nearby.

name: Spit Bridge to Manly
description: Classic harbour track through bush and beaches.
transport: Buses to Spit Bridge; return from Manly ferry.
long: Uneven bush track with stairs; many bays and lookouts.

name: Barrenjoey Lighthouse
description: Short steep climb to a lighthouse with sweeping views.
long: Two routes: steep stairs or gentler access trail.

name: South Head Heritage Trail
description: Hornby Lighthouse, cliff views, and harbour entrance.
long: Mostly flat with some stairs; excellent sunset spot.

name: Cronulla Esplanade
description: Oceanfront path with rock pools and surf beaches.
long: Level concrete path; plenty of water taps and cafés.

name: Royal National Park Coast Track (section)
description: Dramatic cliffs, heathland, and remote beaches.
transport: Train to Cronulla + ferry/bus options; car best.
long: Exposure to sun and wind; carry water, check weather.

name: Balls Head to Waverton
description: Harbour bushland with industrial heritage sites.
long: Formed tracks with some stairs; city views.

name: Berry Island Reserve
description: Short loop with Aboriginal heritage and harbour vistas.
long: Great picnic spot; playground and facilities.

name: North Head Sanctuary Loop
description: Heathland, lookouts and historic military sites.
transport: Ferry to Manly, bus up the hill.
long: Some sandy sections; spectacular harbour mouth views.

name: La Perouse to Cape Banks
description: Coastal heath, golf course edges and dramatic headlands.
long: Exposed track with little shade; watch surf conditions.

name: Bradleys Head to Chowder Bay
description: Harbour foreshore with city skyline viewpoints.
transport: Bus to Taronga Zoo or Clifton Gardens.
long: Mostly formed track; good for families.

name: Gordon’s Bay Coastal Walk
description: Tucked-away bay with an underwater nature trail.
long: Rocky sections; bring snorkel in calm conditions.
